title: Machine Learning and Reverse Engineering-Based Aluminum Alloy Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of materials science fundamentals, statistics, programming basics, and machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers practice academic research methodologies and develop educational case studies integrating material design and data science techniques

learning_goals: Learners can reverse-engineer aluminum alloy compositions using genetic algorithms and machine learning.
Learners can establish data-driven design strategies by analyzing the correlation between microstructure and mechanical properties.
Learners can simulate an actual production-scale alloy design process through team projects in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
